full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 75 of 261 1236 LC6Cmax3 Kate - cross 1 THE COURT: Overruled. You may answer. 2 A. To clarify, didn't I say when? 3 Q. Well, you've spoken to a number of tabloids and magazines throughout the year, haven't you? 4 A. Yes. 5 Q. You have been featured in a number of magazines and news articles, haven't you? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. You have spoken about your life on a number of occasions, haven't you? 8 A. Yes. 9 Q. And your picture has been in a number of magazines, as well; correct? 10 A. Yes. 11 Q. During the period of time that you testified meeting Ghislaine and Epstein, you were an international model? 12 A. I was a model. 13 Q. You met Ghislaine in Paris when you had traveled there with the older prominent gentleman with whom you had been dating at the time; correct? 14 A. Yes. 15 Q. And you learned that that individual was an Oxford classmate of Ghislaine; correct? 16 A. Yes. 17 Q. Now, through the relationship that you had with that older SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012826
